reasoning: Spondylarthritis (including ankylosing spondylitis and related conditions) incidence estimated at 5-6 per 100k person-years globally. Reported as incidence metric for this acute/incident condition.
source: Reveille JD et al. (2005). Epidemiology of HLA-B27 and the seronegative spondyloarthropathies. Am J Med Sci. 329(2):90-98
